articles.author: Eric W. Dolan
articles.title: Fluoride exposure during pregnancy linked to child neurobehavioral issues - PsyPost
articles.description: A study found that higher prenatal fluoride exposure is linked to nearly double the risk of neurobehavioral problems in children at age three, highlighting potential risks even at levels considered safe for preventing dental cavities.
articles.content: Fluoride has been added to community drinking water systems in the United States since 1945 to prevent dental cavities. Currently, 73% of the U.S. population receives fluoridated water at a targeted … [+7074 chars]

articles.description: Emma Williams-Tully felt "vulnerable and alone" when she was put into a chemical menopause at 20.
articles.content:
By Catriona Aitken, BBC News
At 20 years old, Emma Williams-Tully had just started a relationship with her now-husband Dan when she was put into a chemical menopause

articles.author: Eric W. Dolan
articles.title: ADHD and autism: New insights into their unique neural profiles - PsyPost
articles.description: A meta-analysis of 243 fMRI studies revealed that ADHD and autism have distinct brain activity patterns, with unique neural activations for each disorder outweighing their similarities.
articles.content: Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) and autism spectrum disorder (ASD) are two of the most prevalent neurodevelopmental disorders. Despite their distinct diagnostic criteria, there is a n… [+6004 chars]
